tool.name: Scanpy PAGA
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-cli paga --groups '${groups}' #if $neighbors_key --neighbors-key '${neighbors_key}' #end if #if $key_added --key-added '${key_added}' #end if #if $use_rna_velocity --use-rna-velocity #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: neighbors_key
param.label: Name of the slot that holds the KNN graph

param.name: key_added
param.label: Additional suffix to the name of the slot to save the calculated trajectory

param.name: use_rna_velocity
param.label: Use RNA velocity to orient edges in the abstracted graph and estimate transitions.
param.help: Requires that adata.uns contains a directed single-cell graph with key velocity_graph. This feature might be subject to change in the future.
